copy.title: Seed Sorter
copy.welcome_text: Hi there Fairy Friend! Welcome to Sunflower Meadow! I'm sorting seeds to plant in the Spring. I get a little mixed up sometimes. Can you help me pick up pairs of seeds?
copy.host_bubble_3: Choose packets that have the same picture.
copy.host_bubble_4: Match both the picture and the number.
copy.host_bubble_5: The picture and the number must match.
copy.tutorial_step2: Welcome to Treetrunk Knoll! Let me show you how to sort seeds for the mainland!
copy.tutorial_step2b: Find two seed packets with the same picture.
copy.tutorial_step4: You can't use a seed packet if it's surrounded by other seed packets or if another packet overlaps it.
copy.tutorial_step7: Watch the clock if you want to earn bonus points.
copy.tutorial_step8: This tells you which seed packets to sort first. If you sort them fast enough, you'll earn a bonus!
copy.tutorial_step9: Look at the seed packets carefully -- some have numbers on them.
copy.tutorial_step15: Think you got it? Then it's time to start sorting!
copy.fail_secondText: Keep playing and finish the level!
copy.game_over_win_0: All the seed packets are sorted and ready to go to the mainland. Thank you for your help!
copy.game_over_win_1: Spectacular Seed Sorting. Come back anytime you want to help!
copy.game_over_win_2: Congratulations! Superior seed sorting skills! I hope to see you again soon!
copy.game_over_win_3: You really are a super seed sorter! The next time I need help, I'll be sure to look for you!
copy.game_over_win_4: You are marvelous at making seed packet matches! Thank you for your help!
copy.game_over_lose_0: Looks like we've run out of time. But please come back to try again. I'd appreciate your help!
copy.game_over_lose_1: So many seeds, so little time. Don't worry, next time we'll match them all!
copy.perfect_level: PERFECT! You sorted all the seed packets!
copy.timebonus_level: GOOD WORK! You finished sorting in time!
copy.bad_pair_1: Oh no! You make a bad pair!
copy.bad_pair_2: Oh no! It's a wrong pair!
copy.good_pair_2: I'm so impressed with your sorting skills!
copy.finish_family_0: Nice! You have completed a family!
copy.finish_family_1: Good job, you filled one family!
copy.finish_family_3: Very good, you finish a family!
copy.bonus_1: Very nice! You use a bonus!
copy.instruction0: First we have to click on two seed packets which have the same picture on them.
copy.instruction1: A tile is not playable if there are other seed packets partially covering it or if there are other seed packets on all sides.
copy.instruction2: Look here to see which seeds packets you should match first. Match these in time to earn a bonus!
copy.instruction3: Some seed packets have numbers and pictures. Match both to sort them!
copy.easy_story: These packets of fruit seeds must be sorted before they go to the mainland. It simply isn't springtime without pears and apples!
copy.medium_story: Every season brings its own unique flowers to the mainland. Sort these flower seed packets for delivery!
copy.hard_story: Vegetables are a mainland favorite, you know. These veggie seed packets need to be sorted right away for the new season!
copy.royal_story: By the Second Star, these seed packets are a jumbled mess! We need them all sorted right away for the mainland!
copy.easy_exitstory: Wonderful sorting, Fairy friend! I do love a tidy supply of seeds.
copy.medium_exitstory: These flowers will smell wonderful on the mainland! Thank you for helping to sort them!
copy.hard_exitstory: Thank you for your help! Now the mainland will have more tasty vegetables than ever!
copy.royal_exitstory: By the Second Star, you really are a sorting genius! Simply amazing! I'd love to have your help anytime!
copy.allmedium_story: Excellent fruit seed sorting. Now, what's next? Ah yes! Flower seeds!
copy.allhard_story: Splendid sorting, my Fairy friend! You've shown quite a knack for fruit and flower seeds. Now how about these truly tricky vegetables?
copy.allroyal_story: Oh no! The wind toppled all the seed packets we already sorted! If you don't help straighten them out, the seeds won't be ready to go to the mainland!
copy.level_tip_1: Match seed packets that have the same picture.
copy.level_tip_3: The seed packets have numbers on them now. You have to match them too!
copy.level_tip_7: Packet Ants are waiting nearby with extra seed packets in case you get stuck.
copy.level_tip_8: The seed packets are stacked on top of each other now. Try to clear the ones on top first!
copy.level_tip_22: The seed packets are stacked 3 layers high now!
copy.level_tip_30: You're almost there! Pair up these seed packets and you'll be done!
copy.host_level_1_0: Find two seed packets that match.
copy.host_level_1_1: It's not very hard. Look carefully.
copy.host_level_4_1: Match as quickly as you can!
copy.host_level_5_1: Remember, these seeds are for the mainland!
copy.host_level_7_0: Be careful! Don't run out of time!
copy.host_level_11_1: You really are good at this. Keep it up!
copy.host_level_12_0: Sort those seeds for the mainland!
copy.host_level_13_0: Flit to it, my flapping friend!
copy.host_level_14_1: We must match all seeds for all seasons!
copy.host_level_15_0: Without these seeds, we'll be lost!
copy.host_level_15_1: These seeds will create beautiful plants!
copy.host_level_16_0: You can do it, Fairy friend!
copy.host_level_16_1: Together we can match them all!
copy.host_level_18_0: Seeds for all seasons. That's just the thing!
copy.host_level_18_1: Watch for special seeds for extra points!
copy.host_level_19_1: We make a great match -- just like the seeds!
copy.host_level_20_0: Imagine the tiny plants inside those seeds!
copy.host_level_21_0: Flap like the brisk spring breeze!
copy.host_level_22_0: These seeds will give the mainland such beauty!
copy.host_level_24_0: Watch for special seeds for extra points!
copy.host_level_25_0: Seeds give living gifts -- their plants last all season!
copy.host_level_26_0: I daresay you'll be sorting seeds in your sleep!
copy.host_level_27_0: Just wing it! You can do it!
copy.host_level_28_0: Speed for seeds -- you've got it!
copy.host_level_30_1: The soil on the mainland is perfect for these seeds!
copy.host_2: What will your next move be?
copy.host_3: I'm so impressed with your sorting skills!
copy.host_4: The mainland is counting on you!
copy.host_5: That's some fancy flying, my Fairy friend!
copy.host_6: You sort so well! I must tell Queen Clarion!
copy.host_7: Thank the seasons you came to help me.
copy.host_10: As the seeds would say, I'm ROOTING for you!
copy.host_15: You're helping me so much -- keep going!
copy.host_16: The sprouts are counting on you!
copy.host_18: I appreciate your help so much!
copy.host_19: Take a deep breath and keep flapping!
copy.host_20: The garden-talents will be so proud!
copy.host_21: You're a powerful pixie packet pairer!
copy.host_22: Think of the tasty things that will grow!
copy.host_24: It's so kind of you to help like this!
copy.host_25: Try not to get those packets mixed up!
copy.host_26: This is a big job, but I know you can do it!
copy.host_27: I hope your wings aren't getting tired!
copy.host_28: This is an important job, so do your best!
copy.host_29: I'm so pleased by your work so far!
copy.host_30: What natural sorting skills you have!
copy.host_32: Are you sure you didn't sprout from a seed?
copy.host_35: Just wing it! You can do it!
copy.host_36: Imagine the tiny plants inside those seeds!
copy.host_38: Flap like the brisk spring breeze!
copy.host_40: These seeds will give the mainland such beauty!
copy.host_41: I daresay you'll be sorting seeds in your sleep!
copy.host_44: You really are good at this. Keep it up!
copy.host_47: Remember, these seeds are for the mainland!
copy.time_bonus_soon_end: Hurry up! You're running out of time for the bonus.
copy.time_soon_end: Hurry up! You're about to run out of time.
copy.bad_pair: Click the packets that have the same picture.
copy.bad_pair_number: Match both the picture and number on the packets.
